name: Heart Break
description:
The townspeople of Heartsville  are broken in two! Join Hart Jr. in recovering the missing heart pieces, while at the same time teaching the culprits, the Bleeding Heart Gang, a hearty lesson.  But watch out - the gang is no joke! Bounce on their heads to inflict some cardiovascular damage! 

Play your heart out!

---------------------

Made in 4 days for the Coding Blocks Game Jam. 

Theme: Everything is broken
